content:

inventory=[{"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 10}, {"type": "armor_stand", "quantity": 15, "index": 13}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 20, "index": 16}, {"type": "iron_bars", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_terracotta", "quantity": 17, "index": 21}, {"type": "bone_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "light_gray_carpet", "quantity": 52, "index": 28}, {"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 55, "index": 29}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 16, "index": 33}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 50, "index": 41}, {"type": "wither_rose", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a gray_stained_glass I need to craft gray dye. Gray dye is crafted by combining black dye and white dye. Black dye can be obtained from a wither rose, so I will first move the wither rose from slot 43 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft gray stained glass, I need to first craft gray dye. To do so, I need to craft white dye which can be crafted from bone meal. To get bone meal, I need to craft bone blocks from bones, which I have in slot 22. Therefore, I will first move the bone block to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
